mapper.insert: WITH updated AS ( UPDATE notification SET body = #{body}, link_url = #{linkUrl}, created_at = NOW(), read_at = NULL WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND notification_type = 'CHAT_MESSAGE' AND ref_type = 'CHAT_ROOM' AND ref_id = #{chatRoomId} AND is_read = FALSE AND deleted_at IS NULL RETURNING notification_id ) INSERT INTO notification (member_id, notification_type, ref_type, ref_id, body, link_url, is_read, created_at) SELECT #{memberId}, 'CHAT_MESSAGE', 'CHAT_ROOM', #{chatRoomId}, #{body}, #{linkUrl}, FALSE, NOW() WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM updated)
mapper.select: SELECT notification_id, notification_type, ref_type, ref_id, body, link_url, is_read, read_at, created_at FROM notification WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_read = FALSE AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = TRUE, read_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND notification_type = 'CHAT_MESSAGE' AND ref_type = 'CHAT_ROOM' AND ref_id = #{chatRoomId} AND is_read = FALSE AND deleted_at IS NULL
